name: Zombie Rush - Tower Defense
description:
The most challenging tower defense game ever - The battles never end!

The G virus has been unleashed upon the world and it needs to be saved from destruction. A group of heroes is needed to stop the zombies and prevent the citizens from getting infected. You will have to recruit heroes to build a powerful team. As their leader, you will have to train them to unleash their superpowers.

- Gain hero and player experience to level up
- Equip heroes with gear to strengthen them
- Blitz stages to get resources faster
- Upgrade gear
- Grab cores to give heroes more power
- Use drones in combat
- Recruit more heroes
- Build an alliance
- Challenge other players in the arena
- Compete in knockout tournaments

With an array of equipment and gear available, you can make your super heroes invincible. Take part in the military departments training exercises and events in the game to gain valuable resources that you will need along the way!

This tower defense superhero game uses the most advanced 3D technology to bring the characters and scenery to life. By combining many new and different ways of playing, this is the most innovative tower defense game to come along in years.

We welcome you to discuss the game with other players and us on our official WhatsApp that can be found in the settings of the game.
